"Hokuto": "I've recently begun an investigation into the Trainia around Stia."
"Things haven't been going as I would've hoped, though."
"Though we've made our way into Stia's interior, each area is still quite lousy with enemies."
"We simply lack the personnel to lend every researcher a personal bodyguard."
"Which is why I thought of asking for the assistance of an Aelio commando unit like yours."
"First, I want you to clear the Cocoons in Stia, and provide me with that data."
"Whenever is most convenient for you is fine, there's no rush. Good luck."
